message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_NO_CANCEL_PRIMARY
message.locale: The primary client cannot be removed from this Case. You must make another client the primary client before removing this client.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_NO_SET_CANCELLED_AS_PRIMARY
message.locale: You cannot set a canceled client to be the primary client on the Case.
You cannot set a cancelled client to be the primary client on the Case.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_NO_SET_CLOSED_AS_PRIMARY
message.locale: You cannot set a client with a status of closed to be the primary client on the Case.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_NOT_DELETED
message.locale: A client cannot be removed as a member of a Integrated Case when Product Deliveries still exist for them.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_TYPE_PRIMARY_CLIENT
message.locale: The selected client is the current Primary Client.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_XRV_CONCROLEEXISTS
message.locale: This client has already been added to the Case.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_CASE_XRV_END_DATE_END_DATE
message.locale: The Client Role end date must not be later than "%1s" end date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_CASE_XRV_START_DATE_START_DATE
message.locale: The Client Role start date must not be earlier than "%1s" start date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_CLIENT_CANCELLED
message.locale: This client is already canceled
This client is already cancelled

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_NO_CANCEL_CLIENT_ASSESSMENT_EXISTS
message.locale: A client cannot be removed as a member of a Screening Case when Assessments still exist for them.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_FV_CONCERN_NO_REG
message.locale: The client must be registered.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_FV_CLIENT_CANCELLED
message.locale: The client is already canceled.
The client is already cancelled.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_FV_IC_CANCELLED_TYPE_PERSON
message.locale: It is only possible to cancel a client of type Person.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_FV_IC_MODIFIED_TYPE_PERSON
message.locale: It is only possible to modify a client of type Person.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_FV_STATUS_BLANK
message.locale: The Client Role status must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_CASE_XRV_END_DATE_START_DATE
message.locale: The Client Role start date must not be later than "%1s" end date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_FV_TYPECODE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The Client Role type must not be modified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_FV_STARTDATE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The Client Role start date must not be modified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_FV_CLIENT_MODIFIED
message.locale: The Client Role name must not be modified.
